an10.33:1.1: “Katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ubbahikaya sammannitabbo”ti?
an10.33:1.2: “Dasahi kho, upali, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ubbahikaya sammannitabbo.
an10.33:1.4: Idhupali, bhikkhu silava hoti; patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu;
an10.33:1.5: bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha;
an10.33:1.6: ubhayani kho panassa patimokkhani vittharena svagatani honti suvibhattani suppavattini suvinicchitani suttaso anubyanjanaso;
an10.33:1.7: vinaye kho pana thito hoti asamhiro;
an10.33:1.8: patibalo hoti ubho atthapaccatthike sannapetum pannapetum nijjhapetum pekkhetum pasadetum;
an10.33:1.14: Imehi kho, upali, dasahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ubbahikaya sammannitabbo”ti.
